home.name: Hi, I am Asithandile Tyulu
home.greeting: I am an aspiring fullstack developer

about.paragraph: I am an aspiring fullstack developer, a dynamic and passionate writer and former Community Coordinator & Tech Support at Fundza Literacy Trust, a South African non-profit organization that promotes literacy and a love of reading among young people. I am currently studying fullstack development at Life Choices Academy. I fell in love with coding in my role at Fundza, as I had to liaise with ICT service providers to ensure that the site was working well and offering the audience the best user experience. I then left the organisation to pursue software development studies to achieve my goal of being a software developer. In my spare time I like to reading, my favourite book is The Rapture of Canaan by Sheri Reynolds an hounarable mention would be, The Da Vinci Code by Dan Brown. I also love listen to music, Guillotine by Jon Bellion is my favourite song of all time. And last but not least, I love learning more about coding - I take it one language at a time.

projects.description: This is my second e-commerce site, developed using HTML, CSS, Boostrap and JavaScript. The site is fully functional, and hosted on Netfliy
This is my first e-commerce site. The site was made with HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.
I create a site that converts RGB to Hexademicals. It was made with JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.
This is a fully functional interest calculator, developed with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript.
I made a fully functional To Do List using JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Boostrap 5.
I made a fully functional calculator with HTML, CSS, Boostrap and JavaScript.

resume.duties: Uploading content on WordPress. Design covers for content. Troubleshoot the site and report to the team so they can relay the error to their ICT services providers.

User generated data collection and analysis, both qualitative and quantitative. Writing comprehensive reports on data collected. Social media coordination and management. Liaise with external ICT services providers to ensure the site offers the best UX. Content production, writing articles, and short stories.

Tutoring math and English to grade 8 & 9 pupils. Analysing their reports cards, and asking them what they struggle with to see I can maximise my time with them and offer a beneficial program. Creating and following a weekly content plan.

testimonials.testimony: Asithandile is a dedicated worker with an infectious personality and excellent people skills. He has strong resolve, works well with others and keeps an open mind to different points of view.
Asithandile is an eager, humble and hardworking individual. He always strives for excellence. Having a creative mindset, which helps him overcome many obstacles and challenges.

I believe Asithandile is a great asset for any company that chooses to work with him given that on top of his technical skills, he's also sociable, deeply introspective and has a high emotional intelligence making him a great colleague to have.

Asithandile is an exceptionally hardworking individual with a creative and analytical mind. His ability to approach challenges with an open mind and find innovative solutions is truly impressive. Working with Asithandile is a rewarding experience, as his dedication and problem-solving skills contribute immensely to the success of any project.
